name: SumoSmash Demo 1.1
description:
This is my first original game made in unity! It is a sumo game where you and another person fight to push each other off the platform. If you push the other player of the platform, you get a point! First to five wins. It might be a bit primitive as it is my first game, but tell me what you think!

-First to five wins

-Player One (Red) controls with WASD

Player Two (Blue) controls with arrow keys
